trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示一套<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemBindingCollection class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: MenuItemBindingCollection 类用于存储和管理集合的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control uses the MenuItemBindingCollection class as the data type for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件使用 MenuItemBindingCollection 类的数据类型作为其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A> property is used to store any menu item bindings defined for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A>属性用来存储为定义任何菜单项绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The order in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象会显示在集合具有如何将这些对象应用于中的菜单项不会影响<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemBindingCollection class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Item%2A> indexer to directly retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: MenuItemBindingCollection 类支持多种方法可访问集合中的项:-使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Item%2A>索引器以直接检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>特定的从零开始索引处的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>方法来创建可用于循环访问集合的枚举。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the collection into an array.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法以将集合的内容复制到数组。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically manage a MenuItemBindingCollection object by adding and removing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过添加和删除以编程方式管理 MenuItemBindingCollection 对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: To add menu items to the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Add%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将菜单项添加到集合中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Insert%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove nodes from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Remove%2A>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从集合中删除节点，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Remove%2A>、 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemBindingCollection class contains properties and methods that allow you to retrieve information about the collection itself.
trans-unit.target: MenuItemBindingCollection 类包含属性和方法，可用于检索有关集合本身的信息。

trans-unit.source: To find out how many items are in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要找出多少项在集合中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether the collection contains a certain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要确定集合是否包含某一特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Contains%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Contains%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: To get the index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象在集合中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.IndexOf%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 追加指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>到集合末尾的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to append the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用的 Add 方法追加指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>到集合末尾的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can add null values and duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;>，可以添加 null 值或重复<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>到集合的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can insert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object in the collection at a specific index by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，你可以将插入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>中通过使用特定索引处的集合对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Insert%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The order in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象会显示在集合具有如何将这些对象应用于中的菜单项不会影响<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> to append to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"> </xref>要追加到集合的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The index at which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> was inserted in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 开始的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>插入到集合中。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>对象位于集合中。

trans-unit.source: Use the Contains method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Contains 方法来确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>集合中包含对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object before performing a task, such as adding or removing a menu item binding from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常用于测试是否存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>之前执行的任务，如添加或从集合中删除菜单项绑定的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"> </xref>查找。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> is contained in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>包含在集合; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection"></xref> object to a compatible one-dimensional array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: 将复制中的所有项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection"></xref>到兼容的一维数组的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>对象，从目标数组中指定索引处开始。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified zero-based array.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法以将集合的内容复制到指定的从零开始的数组。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 目标数组的指定索引处开始复制项目。

trans-unit.source: With the array, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 与数组中，你可以然后使用数组语法访问中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>方法来创建用于访问集合中的项的枚举。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> objects that receives the copied items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个从零开始的数组<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>接收复制的项集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.
trans-unit.target: 若要开始接收复制的内容的目标数组中的位置。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the IndexOf method to determine the index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: IndexOf 方法用于确定指定的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>集合中的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The order in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象会显示在集合具有如何将这些对象应用于中的菜单项不会影响<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the menu item binding is not in the collection, the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果菜单项绑定不是集合中，该方法将返回-1。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the specified menu item binding appears multiple times in the collection, the index of the first occurrence is returned.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果指定的菜单项绑定在集合中出现多次，则返回第一个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> to determine the index of.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"> </xref>来确定的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of value within the collection, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 第一个匹配项的从零开始索引 value 在集合中，如果找到; 否则为-1。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object to the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>到集合中的指定的索引位置处的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the Insert method to insert the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object in the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Insert 方法将指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>集合中指定索引处的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can add null values and duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;>，可以添加 null 值或重复<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>到集合的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can simply append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object to the end of the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，只需可以附加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象与使用集合的末尾<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Add%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The order in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects appear in the collection has no effect on the how those objects are applied to the menu items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象会显示在集合具有不起作用的方式这些对象应用到中的菜单项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的从零开始的索引位置<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"> </xref>插入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object at the specified index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>从集合的指定索引处的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object from the collection at the specified index using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 使用此索引器访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>从集合中使用数组表示法的指定索引处的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The indexer allows you to access, modify, or replace a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object in the collection directly.
trans-unit.target: 索引器可以访问、 修改或替换<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>直接集合中的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>来检索。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"> </xref>集合中的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 中移除指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>从集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the Remove method to remove the specified menu item binding from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用删除方法从集合中移除指定的菜单项绑定。

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that menu item are then moved up to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: 然后按照该菜单项的所有项都将上都移以填充空出的位置。

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 移动项的索引也将更新。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The collection can contain null values, as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 集合可以包含 null 值，以及重复<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a menu item from a specific index in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，可移除菜单项集合中的特定索引使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove all menu items from the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以还所有菜单项从集合中都移除使用<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The order in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects appear in the collection has no effect on how those objects are applied to the menu items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象会显示在集合具有如何将这些对象应用于中的菜单项不会影响<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"> </xref>若要从集合中移除。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object at the specified index location from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 删除<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>对象从集合中指定的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the RemoveAt method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object at the specified index location from the collection.
trans-unit.target: RemoveAt 方法用于删除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象从集合中指定的索引位置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that menu item are then moved up to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: 然后按照该菜单项的所有项都将上都移以填充空出的位置。

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 移动项的索引也将更新。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The collection can contain null values, as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 集合可以包含 null 值，以及重复<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，你可以删除特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Remove%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBindingCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove all menu items from the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以还所有菜单项从集合中都移除使用<xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the menu item binding to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的菜单项绑定从零开始的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
